title: Alaska Coffee Roasting Co.
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local coffee shop and roaster with in-house bakery. Has soy and almond milk. Menu, while mostly non-veg, does include wood fired pizzas with vegan Daiya cheese, a roasted veggie sandwich, salads (ask to omit cheese/meat), and a daily soup which are sometimes veg. Has Wi-Fi.
